title: on me by section 87(1A) of the Road Traffic Act 2010 (No. 25 of 2010), hereby
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2010 (Section
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2010 (Section 

87(1A)) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited road traffic act 2010 (section 87(1a)) regulation 2024

title: on me by section 87(1A) of the Road Traffic Act 2010 (No. 25 of 2010), hereby
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“driving and vehicle instruction” means instruction approved by the Garda 
Síochána to be provided to trainees in relation to the driving or use of a vehicle 
in the performance of the duties of a member of the Garda Síochána; 

“trainee” means a person to whom driving and vehicle instruction is provided – 

(a) who is a member of the Garda Síochána, or 

(b) who is admitted to training, in accordance with the Garda 
Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of 2005), for membership in the Garda 
Síochána; 

“trainer”, in relation to a trainee, means a person approved by the Commissioner 
to provide driving and vehicle instruction to the trainee.
text_norm: 2 regulation - driving vehicle instruction mean instruction approved garda siochana provided trainee relation driving use vehicle performance duty member garda siochana trainee mean person driving vehicle instruction provided - (a) member garda siochana (b) admitted training accordance garda siochana act 2005 (no 20 2005) membership garda siochana trainer relation trainee mean person approved commissioner provide driving vehicle instruction trainee

title: on me by section 87(1A) of the Road Traffic Act 2010 (No. 25 of 2010), hereby
heading: 3. Each class of persons specified in the Schedule is prescribed as a class of
text_raw:
3. Each class of persons specified in the Schedule is prescribed as a class of 
persons to whom section 87(1) of the Road Traffic Act 2010 (No. 25 of 2010) 
shall apply. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [538] 3

heading: SCHEDULE

title: on me by section 87(1A) of the Road Traffic Act 2010 (No. 25 of 2010), hereby
heading: 1. Trainees engaged in the receipt of driving and vehicle instruction from a
text_raw:
1. Trainees engaged in the receipt of driving and vehicle instruction from a 

trainer, for the duration of such instruction.
text_norm: 1 trainee engaged receipt driving vehicle instruction trainer duration instruction

title: on me by section 87(1A) of the Road Traffic Act 2010 (No. 25 of 2010), hereby
heading: 2. Trainers engaged in the provision of driving and vehicle instruction to
text_raw:
2. Trainers engaged in the provision of driving and vehicle instruction to 

trainees, for the duration of such instruction. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Transport, 

17 October, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport.
